text:
There are at least three - although some say for marketers (incorrectly I think):

 - HubSpot CMS for Developers
 - HubSpot CMS for Developers II: Best Practices
 - Integrating With HubSpot I: Foundations

Hi <@U02227D27V3> a similar issue with another RevOps quiz also came up in the community last week (<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Academy-Supp|thread here>)

When I opened my cert and tried to recreate, I was able to select the right answer, but when they selected the same answer it was wrong.

logging out with clearing cache resolved the issue
This UI leaves a lot to be desired, I've shared feedback with the Academy team directly and while I don't have timing, they are looking at better solutions to improve the UX
